task_text: Adjust AI Skills Memory to prefer vector DB (Chroma/Ollama) for similar/multilingual context term matching; avoid SQLite for text search; keep deterministic SQL as fallback/test-only.
summary: Made context resolution vector-first (exact SQL match → Chroma similarity → SQL LIKE/token fallback), updated docs to recommend --seed-mode chroma for real agent use, and confirmed functional tests still pass.

outcome.notes: Vector similarity is now preferred for context matching even in SQL seed mode; SQL LIKE/token matching remains as fallback.
